paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR-Val30Met variant, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: The penetrance estimates were low and varied by age and parental inheritance.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, penetrance was significantly higher when the mutation was inherited from the mother than from the father.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the importance of low penetrance in TTR-FAP kindreds for genetic counseling.
key_quotes: The penetrance estimates were low i.e. 1.7% and 22% at age 30 and 60 years, respectively and far from complete (69%), by age 90 years.
Moreover, penetrance was significantly higher when the mutation was inherited from the mother than from the father.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR-Val30Met variant was extracted from the main text.
